judicialResults.label: Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
SUSPS - Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
Committed to prison for 4 Years suspended for 2 Years. Reason: there has been a wilful and persistent failure to comply with your community order. The defendant must comply with the requirements within the supervision period. This order is to be reviewed Half-yearly starting on 31/01/2025 at 10:30 at Swansea Crown Court. In the event of activation of sentence: 10 bail remand days to count. Total custodial period 4 Years. Supervision period: 2 Years.

judicialResults.label: Drug rehabilitation non-residential with review
judicialResults.resultText:
DRNRR - Drug rehabilitation non-residential with review
Drug Rehabilitation Requirement: Have treatment for drug dependency by or under the direction of WELSH COURT at Welsh Rehab Centre as a non-resident for 8 Months. To be reviewed Quarterly. First review on 10/12/2024 at 14:00 at Cardiff Magistrates' Court, courtroom Courtroom 01.
judicialResults.welshLabel: Adsefydlu defnyddiwr cyffuriau - dibreswyl gydag adolygiad
